attributes.additional_details: Scotland voted to remain in Europe in the EU referendum. The UK parliament has steadfastly ignored this fact and whilst it has paid the DUP to maintain its declining majority it has made no attempts to negotiate or appease the Scots. Since the EU referendum it has come to light how comprehensively lied to and manipulated the Scots have been through both referendum. Scotland now requires independence
attributes.background: Scotland voted to remain in Europe. It is clear Westminster will force the UK out. Scotland needs a section 30 order to start the independence process so it can be a prosperous and represented country in Europe.
